title: AI That Hears: Audio Understanding
description: One-minute skill: AI That Hears: Audio Understanding.

hook.text: Whisper transcribes speech in 99 languages. It handles accents, background noise, and technical jargon.

buildup.text: OpenAI's Whisper was trained on 680,000 hours of multilingual audio data from the web.

discovery.text: It performs speech recognition, translation, and language identification in a single model.

twist.text: Whisper sometimes hallucinates â€” generating plausible but nonexistent speech when audio is unclear.

climax.text: Audio AI enables real-time translation earbuds, meeting transcription, and accessible communication.

punchline.text: The Tower of Babel meets its match. AI hears every language.

quiz.question: What unique capability does Whisper combine in one model?
options: Speech recognition, translation, and language identification
